scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start-server
scripts.dev: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run builddev-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html && npm run watch-html & npm run watchdev-js & npm run watch-css & npm run start-server
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.build-css: stylus app.styl -o dist/ && cp c3.css dist/c3.css
scripts.builddev-js: cp app.js dist/app.js && cp c3.min.js dist/c3.min.js && cp d3.min.js dist/d3.min.js
scripts.build-js: browserify app.js --outfile dist/app.js --transform babelify && cp c3.min.js dist/c3.min.js && cp d3.min.js dist/d3.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch-html & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & npm run start-server
